attributes.action: Rethink the Car Scrapage Scheme, and not allow "old & Classic" cars to be scraped, unless they have been classed as un repairable by a garage,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well since the new scrap scheme, owners of cars not worth £2000 are scraping them, not that this is a bad thing alot cars do need to be off the road, but in the same way tax exempt works, certain cars or cars of a certain age, should not be allowed to be scrapped. maybe people are selling cars thinking that there worth 2k, this is unfair on British heritage!
